appDesc.message: Save all images in active tab as .zip file. Easily save photos from Instagram, Google Images, etc.

filename_mask_desc.message: Enter a word to use as image file name. For example, entering "pic" as file name pattern, generates images with names: pic1, pic2, pic3, etc. Leave this field empty to use original image file names.

image_size_desc.message: Images smaller than this threshold are excluded from download. This setting applies to raster formats.

include_vectors_desc.message: Vectors are scalable graphics typically used as page icons. Disable this option to exclude vectors from being downloaded.

max_timeout_desc.message: Timeout controls how long to wait for a single image to download. When image download exceeds this limit, download of that image will fail.

no_images.message: Sorry, did not find any images.

opera_search.message:
To use this extension with with search engines, check "Allow access to search page results" in Opera extensions settings.

Click OK to fix now.

step1_body.message:
Thank you for installing Download All Images.

This short demo will show you how to use it.

step2_body.message: Download All Images can be used on any web page that has images â€“ such as this one.

step3_body.message:
1. click extension menu

2. then click:

Download All Images

Go ahead and try it now.

step3_body_alt.message:
Click Download All Images icon to start download.

Go ahead and click the icon now.

step4_body.message: When done, you will get a zip file containing all downloaded images.

step5_body.message:
If the download ever gets stuck or you want to cancel it, click the icon again to stop download.

You will get a zip file with all images downloaded so far.

step6_body.message:
We hope you like Download All Images.

If you find it useful please rate it and share with your friends.
